name: TheWraithTrails
description:
GamePlay: Progress through each level defeating monsters, gathering potions and weapons, preparing to fight the wraith king.

Features:

• Hard: No save/load

• Weapons: Find various swords, axes, and bows

• Potions: Find potions to increase your max health, or heal you in combat

• Levels: 10 levels to play though.

• Monsters: Lots of monsters!
